mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, g.* from (select * from game order by regist_date desc) g) where rnum <= #{value}

select * from game
where name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by regist_date desc
order by (likes - unlikes) desc
order by hit desc
select * from game where id in (select game_id from hotGame where startdate <= sysdate and sysdate <= enddate)

select * from (select * from score where trunc(sysdate,'mm') <= play_timestamp and play_timestamp <= last_day(sysdate)) where game_id in (select game_id from hotGame where startdate = (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual))
